body:
The missing comma generated your error, but you'll get some other errors if you don't pass kbin a normalized vector.  Use:


	-b "kbin(sqrt(.5),-sqrt(.5),0,0,0,1)"


instead.


-Greg
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2015-May/010963.html).</sup>
